content.p:
ยง 805. Personnel; compensation. 1. The commissioner by official order
may assign to the work of the board, or any part thereof, any officer or
employee of the department, who shall perform such services under this
article as the commissioner may direct. The persons so appointed shall
not receive any additional compensation for services performed, but
shall be allowed their actual and necessary expenses incurred in the
performance of their duties under this article.
 2. Each appointive member of the board shall be entitled to be
reimbursed for his traveling and other expenses actually and necessarily
incurred by him in the performances of his duties and, in addition,
shall receive a compensation to be fixed by the commissioner within the
amount available by appropriation.
